rule: Prioritize the highest similarity score only if it aligns with the visual evidence; otherwise, rely on detailed visual analysis.
failure_pattern: The model incorrectly predicted 'Magnolia Warbler' instead of 'White-eyed Vireo', despite the bird's features matching the White-eyed Vireo description.

rule: Focus on specific, unique morphological features when distinguishing between closely related species.
failure_pattern: The model incorrectly predicted 'Northern Waterthrush' due to overlooking the distinctive features of the Brown Creeper such as its long, thin bill and speckled underparts.

rule: Focus on the unique combination of features such as the long, slightly curved beak and strong, dark-colored legs when identifying birds.
failure_pattern: The model incorrectly identified the bird as a Northern Waterthrush instead of a Sage Thrasher due to similarities in some visual characteristics.
